Create and see commands list for Minecraft bedrock easily in your browser

# How works the page?

1. The page access to the file [`mojang-commands.json`](../../../../Mojang/bedrock-samples/blob/main/metadata/command_modules/mojang-commands.json)
2. Then the page script read the JSON file and convert in HTML tags.
3. The script insert the HTML tags to the page.

# Contributing
If you want to make a contribution in the repository, you need to read the [contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md) file.
